content.detailedDescription: Went outside to smoke a cigarette and sky watch early a.M.. looking east i watched the sky for about 20 minutes.I finished my cigarette and walked back to the house. as i approach the door i looked up and noticed orions belt. i stopped and went back out in the yard because i was just watching orions belt looking to the east. as i looked at it again it began to tilt and move towards me. i took my phone out and began to record it. not sure if my phone would record it i went back in the house and woke my brother for a witness. the reason i am submitting this video is not for the video but for the audio. the night was cold and the air was still with absolutely no noise pollution. although these crafts were rather close they were completely silent. as they passed over and headed west my phone mic recorded a strange sound that needs to be analyzed. the audio of this is a little colourful but i was caught in the moment of something that was beyond our technology.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Sky watching early a.M.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed this object almost 1 year ago while walking my dog.  i heard something in the tree which turned out to be a squirrel but as i looked into the sky i noticed this large triangle shape object rather large with a blue light flashing from time to time.  i thought it was a star at first because it was so high but after studying the object and using my binoculars clearly this was not a star or any type of aircraft.  it has stayed stationary for almost one year until a couple of nights ago it came down or when i noticed it had changed locations and much lower.  i took one of my very powerful military flashlights and flashed it on and off at the object not thinking anything of it.  when i went to walk my dog an hour or two later this object not only followed me around the whole complex but sent a drone of some type that stayed 350 ft ahead of me the whole time.  scared me to death thought i was going to be abducted for sure.  later that night a military aircraft flew over my complex in sweeping patterns for almost 2 hours the ufo's never moved and last night i counted 15 of the exact same ufo all throughout the sky very high and the reason i know was they all had the signature blue light.  there is something major going on here and i need someone with proper equipment to photograph this and catalog what is going on in case i'am  abducted.  i never lost sight of the object it stayed in the sky all night.  it moves very slow and have never seen it make fast movement yet.
content.summary: Started as 1 ufo 1 year ago stationary. now it has started moving and has followed me walking my dog the last two nights sending a drone also to follow me.  i counted 16 identical ufo's in sky last night

content.detailedDescription:
Hanging out with friends. 
looking up at clear skies 
unknown 
jump from spot to spot
i was very curious of what i was seeing!
it just disappeared
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Erratically movement

content.detailedDescription: Was heading home after the pub closed saw the only star in the sky but quickly noticed stars doen't move like that. so filmed it keeping my screen steady. never in my life have i seen something move like that. it was above to the left of the white hill that is covered in trees, only fields beyond that. i forgot i filmed it and found it on my phone days later then i remembered about it. image of where i was standing and approx highlighted area i saw it attached in file
content.summary: [link removed/dr/cms] see the footage for yourself

content.detailedDescription: I was out side looking at the star thinking how beautiful they are when one moved. so i  stared at it  thinking i was a falling star. but then it started moving side to side and down and then it moved in a circle. i went to get my husband to make sure i wasn’t seeing things and he said it must be a falling star and i told him it moved in a circle. i went and got my daughter and she said no mom it just moved side to side stars don’t move side to side as we were looking at it together it moved down and went  straight up in the air and then back down and made a circle we kept watching it it was moving so i got my phone and started recording
content.summary: Looked like a star but then it moved to the left and then to the right it moved in a circle and side to side. i got my husband to make sure i  wasn’t seeing things  and he said  it was a falling star and then it moved up way up and and back do

content.detailedDescription: I had got in from work on aug bank hol monday 2014 around 3am. i made myself a coffee and rolled a cig and went into the back garden as is my normal practise. on looking at the sky trying to find stars i am familiar with. unfortunately because of the thick fluffy low clouds i could only see dimmer stars in the large gap in the cloud immediately above my head and to the right. on looking back to cloud edge on my left i noticed an object come from the cloud, the shape i can only describe as like a peanut half. the object proceeded in a smooth straight line across the gap in the cloud. the object was a brilliant white like that of a lightbulb or a full moon but without a corona or any kind of blurry effect. the definition was so clear and it took 5-7seconds to cross such a massive gap and on entering the cloud did not shine through considering it’s brightness as the moon usually does. living as i do close to manchester airport i am well used to seeing planes, helicopters and light aircraft day and night and i believe this was no conventional aircraft i am aware of. the short experience has been on my mind for nearly four years without really knowing why so i felt i needed to share it. i remember  thinking during the observation quite a lot in such a small length of time such as well u cocky so an so’s you really don’t care who sees you and many more. other feelings entered my mind like feeling serene and amused at the blatancy of it. i also didn’t feel it was threatening or intrusive, it made me feel content without understanding why
content.summary: Low fluffy cloud with large gap a shape like a half peanut brilliant light like moon or lightbulb covered great distance in 5-7 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting outside an abandoned building on mission st. near the corner of industrial pkwy in hayward, just chilling with a beer. i was looking down the parkway towards the west when something caught my eye. it appeared to be at about treetop level, hovering toward mission st. (eastbound) running parallel to the parkway. what caught my eye was the unearthly glow of the thing and its straight and even path. i almost dismissed it off as a lost silver balloon until i kept staring at it and realized it wasn't anything man-made. i even shouted to the houses near-by "hey guys! we've got a ufo here!!!" hoping someone would film this. i even stopped somebody on the sidewalk and asked "what do you think that is?" (witness 2). the ufo was about a football field away or less, about the size of a compact car or slightly bigger. the object appeared to have two distinct features, one is a dull black/green rotating wheel with a broken triangle or arrow pattern tread design that was rotating in the direction of travel and at the same speed. it must have been going around 10-15 mph up industrial. the second and more vivid part was the center axis of the wheel which consisted of a glowing morphing mass of supernatural light or energy. as it was moving, the glowing mass would flash pink, silver-white, go dim or disappear and repeat but it was really weird to watch. it seemed to be in a distinct sequence. the glowing mass would also appear to elongate diagonally in a semi-diamond pattern and go back to a morphing mass. i was in total awe, witness 2 didn't seem to be really interested, but admitted it looked very strange after watching for around 30 seconds and left towards the shopping center on the corner of industrial & mission where this thing was floating over. it changed course when it got to mission st. and started to run parallel to it and increased its speed some. 

  i followed it down the sidewalk, it started to ascend and move further away. it kept increasing its distance towards the nw to well over .5 mile. this whole time, it kept changing color sequence until it appeared as a silver star in sky. it ascended and hovered at one point, floated some more and came straight down and followed a path, at well over 2 miles away or greater. it finally took off toward the nw, appearing as a bright star. while it was leaving, i noticed a dim dot (part of it?) glow red and go after it at one point. it finally faded out. wildest thing i've ever witnessed. as it was leaving, there was a cessna in the area going to the east and must have seen it (potential witness 3). also, there was a high-flying "contrail" plane going towards the west who couldn't have missed that bright star outside his window to the north (potential witness 4).
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Wheel-type ufo with pulsating/morphing glowing center in hayward, ca.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving east on rt 23 (3.5 miles west of rt 100), in rural area at 2:30pm on monday 12 march '18, little or no traffic, no precipitation, bright - no shadows, speed limit 50 mph. 

i then observed a dark in color (but maybe not black) low flying a/c (?) in level flight, moving at reasonably rapid flt. speed estimated by me at between 160 to 180mph. a/c appeared to be quite long and slender with a noticeably thin middle or waist section. no wings or tail empennage was visible from my angle of view, possibly due to low flight altitude. with no apparent adjustment of angle of flight the local forested hill (chestnut hill @800' to 900' in height) was cleared with what appeared to be several hundreds of feet of clearance. 

total time of observation estimated at less than 15 seconds, from initial view directly in front of me at estimated distance of 1.5 to 2 miles, until out of view to my left as the local hill then prevented further observation. no markings, no windows visible, no engine pods or bulges visible, no vapor or exhaust trail visible. except for the relatively low speed, i thought it might be some iteration of a terrain-following cruise missile or otherwise a military vehicle.

the flight path, if continued, would have taken it near to pottstown municipal airport, about three miles north of the aforementioned forested hill.

i slowed down and looked in all quadrants for a possible orbit of the vehicle, but observed nothing further.

it is possible that this vehicle may have been observed at pottstown municipal n47 or maybe it was high enough to appear on airport radar at reading (pa) regional airport
content.summary: Long, slender dark shape; flight path from south to north; est. distance of 1 to 2 miles +/-; altitude est. 800' to >1800'; in sight for less than 1 minute, est. speed 160 - 180 mph.

content.detailedDescription:
Clearwater ,florida. waiting to see the space station fly over when this craft was noticed.

very quiet, thought it was a blimp. moving real slow like a blimp.

spoke to an air-force friend and he sent me to youtube.

found the same craft on youtube, the usaf top secret 
   nuclear powered flying triangle-  tr-3b

went from north to south. three lights underneath but steady not blinking.

when i realized it wasn't a blimp, wasn't sure i wanted to tell anyone.


craft appeared from the north and disappeared to the south.
content.summary: Waiting to see space station fly over when this was noticed, very slow, three steady lights,

content.detailedDescription: It was around 10-10:30 in the morning, a beautiful sunny morning. so i decided to go outside with my coffee.I was looking over at my sister's back yard when out of nowhere i get the urge to look up and to the right, just above the building in front of my sister's yard. i see these two glowing orbs(that's when i ran inside to get my camera and started recording) and i look over to the left where they were coming from and there was another one following behind and the two that were further up hovered and sat there as though they were waiting on the last one to catch up. they were flying on one path never changing direction. while recording my eyes were watering so much it streamed down my cheeks the sun was so bright.I also remember feeling anxious, not in a bad way. kind of a child like sense of shock and awe. the sun was too bright and so i lost sight of them after two minutes.
content.summary: I can only describe those objects as these reflective and glowing. flying in one path never changing direction. the sun that day was pretty bright, bright enough to make my eyes water, which made it difficult to record them.

content.detailedDescription: Walking down the street to go home and saw something over lake ontario that was just hovering over the lake and then took off at an incredible speed after which i could not see it.
content.summary: Hovering disc that just took off fast.

content.detailedDescription: I put my dogs out around 5:30am when i noticed a bright flash in the sky off to my right. i focused on the spot. i could not see any object in the sky. there were no clouds. then around 10-12 seconds later it flashed again. it was a white light; like turning on a flashlight. once it turned off, i could not spot any object. it seemed to be pretty high in the sky. this went on for a good 10-15 min. it would flash every 10-12 seconds.  it seemed to change location when it flashed, but not by much. after about 10-min it seemed to slowly steer east. at that point i lost sight of the object. one last thing, when it flashed, it was brighter than any object in the sky.
content.summary: Flashing light in the sky, every 10-12 seconds will little to no movement of the object.

content.detailedDescription: Came out of house, getting ready for work, having coffee. noticed bright orb-like sphere that looked out of place in skies, blending in with stars, in hydro corridor near my house. it was too bright to be a star or planet. it looked almost like a drone or satellite, but almost lifeless and just sitting there in a high altitude.
content.summary: Strange, bright spherical/orb-like - recorded a few times in 2017 near a hydro corridor of toronto.

content.detailedDescription: We were coming home from church one night with my parents and sister - all of us saw this. almost as soon as we turn out on to the highway, across the road a little bit further down in the pastors sister's field there are three giant fireballs hovering close to their house but not completely over it, mainly over the field. there bottom two fireballs were just above the treeline. we were completely shocked but we were afraid to stop, so we drove past and went to get a closer look by coming up behind the field on a back road. we could see them nearly the entire time, they never changed position, just hovered there. once we got on the backroad to the spot where they were supposed to be, they were gone. i've tried to do research over the years to find out what it was. i've never seen anything like it. we still bring it up from time to in family conversations to make sure we actually did see that and it wasn't just one of ours imagination. they fireballs were so huge someone else must have seen it. but i haven't spoken to anyone else about it in the area. i would love to know if anyone else has seen anything like this before.
content.summary: Three gigantic fireballs in the sky - one above, two below forming a vertical triangle shape

content.detailedDescription:
Out walking the dog. noticed the lights nothing noticed the lights as being unusual. no social events scheduled in the los angeles area.
presidential visit to the area this week.
content.summary: Very large as evidenced by spacing of lights. view magnified image

content.detailedDescription:
We were at wheedon island preserve in the tampa/st. petersburg area. i looked up into the clear blue sky admiring the nice day at approximately 4:15 pm and saw approximately 5 round/orb shaped flying objects hovering in one spot high in the sky. they weren't a distinct color- more grey/white/glass looking. i would not have believed my eyes, and attributed it to dirty sunglasses, but then my husband who was looking around as well looked up and entirely unprovoked said, "do you see that?" it was then i knew we were observing something unusual. i started to come to the realization that this is no way resembled any plane, drone, blimp, etc and i felt this could very likely be ufo's.  moments later, they disappeared- literally just dissipated. i scanned the horizon left and right to see where they went, but there was no trace. i have a master's degree, and my husband is also college educated. we work in professional, "corporate america" jobs. this was highly unusual and i felt warrants a report.  i am still in shocked disbelief, yet fully confident this was an encounter and observation with a ufo.  
since i live close to macdill air force base, i am highly curious if any radar equipment from the base captured this in airspace.
content.summary: Tampa/st. pete sighting- 5 orb shaped hovering objects that disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
i was taking my normal walk at night, i have anxiety and the best way for me to calm down is to blare music in my ear and walk. i was by myself, walking on a dirt road, close to a building since i was still on my schools campus. i live in a very small town, only about 1000 people live here so there is very little light pollution. this makes the stars in the sky very visible, so when i happened to look into the sky i noticed a large chunk of it was solid black. 
     i stopped in my tracks and stared at the slowly moving black mass. my first thought was it was a giant bird of some sort, circling prey in the sky. but as i continued to stare i noticed the shape itself was not bird like but like a disc. the light from the building i was nearby reflected off the object just enough i could make out some features. the object itself was spinning very slowly while floating through the sky. i started to feel fear as my mind put the picture together. 
    i kind of always believed that there was other life in this world but i’m one of those people that i don’t truly let myself believe something unless i see it. i had no immediate explanation for what this object could be. and because of the way it was moving and the proximity of it, it felt almost predatory. my immediate thought was to get out of there and head indoors. my heart was racing and i kept looking up into the sky to see if it was following me. i never saw it again, i called my mother and told her exactly what i saw while i was walking. being on the phone with someone made me feel better about the situation. i haven’t walked at night alone again since that night. 
   the sketch i submitted is obviously a very rough one. but you can get the idea of what i saw. the little bit of outline and detail i could see was from the reflected light from the building i was near. 
    after reviewing the night in my head for awhile i don’t think the object was following me. i think it was heading somewhere and trying to keep a low profile. i just happened to be there to see it.
content.summary: Looked up and saw floating black object, moving very slowly. seemed like it was following me.

content.detailedDescription:
1. my wife and i were standing on our deck recording the sky.
2. it appeared in our field of vision
3. before the object appeared on the second night, i got a strange pressure in my head and my wife felt nauseous.  i knew this was the object i recorded from the night before - my thought.
4. the second night it appeared and then moved in a easterly direction and dissappeared as it did the night before.  except the night before it appeared and barely moved in the south.
5. my feelings were shock.  i am flabbergasted that there is a ufo that has show up the exact same time 2 nights in a row.  first night was 7:15, then we had daylights savings and it was 8:15 the next night.
6. it just fades out.
content.summary: We recorded this event and the night before, same object different directions each night.

content.detailedDescription: Was was walking home through a laneway. it is my habit to take pictures. i noticed a glow in the distance and took pictures. then this entity appeared fairly close to me. i have submitted photos below. i could only see the entity on the camera. not sure what it was. there is no flash on my camera either.
content.summary: The entity was captured on my phone camera, could not see it with the naked eye. it was in the distant and came quite close to me.

content.detailedDescription:
While removing some bee boxes in our rear pasture i observed four series of red flashing orbs between 8:20 p and 8:40 p about 1-2 miles from the end of our property line in the direction of a large cell phone communications tower.

the first pattern had 4 orbs in a "y" pattern, this lasted for 5 minutes then the orbs disappeared. a few minutes later about 20 degrees to the northwest the orbs reappeared only this time there were 5 orbs in a "cross" pattern, this lasted for about 5 minutes and then the orbs disappeared. again, a few minutes later in the same northwest direction the orbs came back and this time there were eight in a "starburst" pattern, this lasted for 5 minutes approx and then they disappeared. then the lights came back one last time and appaeared in a odd pattern, 6 in a straight line with one orb above the 2nd light, and one below the 2nd light. to the second, the lights lasted for another 5 minutes and then they disappeared and did not come back.

a few nights later on march 3, 2018 while fixing my well pump i observed a single red orb that appeared, made some odd manuevers in the same area of the sky as the last signting was observed and then after 10 minutes it vanished.

i have not seen anything else to date. these were not airplanes or helicopters, we see those fly over our farm all the time. these were not the red light from the communications tower either because i could see the tower off to the side of the orbs just fine.

i have been unable to explain this hence why i decided to report it.
content.summary: Hovering pattern of firey lights, at least 8 orbs, in complex patterns

content.detailedDescription: He said they were "zipping around".
content.summary: My ex husband saw these and our son sent them to me

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to get a coffee as i seen in the far rghit by a building it was trying to hide and seem to be not working rghit i have seen many lights befor but never like this and so close to the ground the colors to it i cant dissrive it had all kinds of lights and it was so bright it was hard to make out what it was some thing that will go throw my mide for rest of my life i live on the outside of a small city so i see lot of lights in the sky but this woow was cool i pulld my phone out to take a video as i turn my phone on i got a chillin feeling thow my head and got a headache and my cell did not respond to anything as i started to walk to tim to get my coffe i could not see the ufo anymore i only looked a way 2 secs to pull my cell out i got my coffe and started to walk over to where i saw it and it was not there but it left a bunch of drit talls and grabbed was scander over the grass.. sorry about my spelling
content.summary: Was turing a around a tall building seem likeit was hideing

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving, these lights that i seen or so large that it caught my attention. it was three lights the two on the end or slightly higher then the light in the middle. these lights from my perspective could be as large as a building. the lights were very low to building level. i've never seen anything like it, it was definitely not a plane. these lights were stationary and almost seeming to hover over this particular area. but, can't be for certain about the hovering. i would say i may have been about a mile give or take away from these lights. i know that these lights we're not over this particular building i was looking at but that told me just how massive these objects were. i believe these lights could have been very far away from me. they were so low in the sky i could not see them as i was driving over trees or other objects, i turned back around and went over a bridge so i could try to see them again, and i lost them, they were nowhere to be found.
content.summary: There were three lights. the two on the each end were slightly higher than the middle. and they were low to eye level, from my perspective they were building level. they we're stationary. it was not a plane. so large it was shocking.

content.detailedDescription: My son and myself were traveling east on highway 50 just west of salem, wv. i needed to use a restroom and pulled over. i saw the flashing object in the sky and pointed it to my son. i relieved my bladder. we both looked again at the object and agreed that it was a ufo. it appeared to be the distance of a high flying jet plane and that is what we that it was. but it remained stationary in the sky. it was a bright circle. flashing ever second or so but the first flash was 100% and the second flash seem 50/50 like a half moon, the third was dark. this continued several minutes until we left. i recorded it with my i6 iphone. the image spears to jerk around but it was stationary. i could not see the one that in my phone camera and was going up and down looking for it
content.summary: Motionless flashing light at airline altituy

content.detailedDescription: Might just be a reflection of my fence lights off my camera or maybe ufos know how to be elusive and blend in.  sea lions stopped making noise.
content.summary: Heard sea lions from puget sound making noise...Snapped some photos

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette approximately 11pm.  extremely windy night  (20mph gusts) as cold front blew in. i saw a beam/flash out of corner of my eye toward nw. so i watched the area and it happened again.  same light beam, same area. it was like a spot light coming from behind some light clouds. i called for my husband to see it. he witnessed 2 more beams, about 10 or 15 seconds apart.  then just like that, we didn't see it again. first time in my life to see anything ufo related that i couldn't explain.  i didn't see any aircraft to describe. the beam didn't go to the ground, from my view it was about 4 inches length up and down. there wasn't any sound, as the wind was unimaginable.  i counted a total of 6 "flash/beams" really cool!
content.summary: Beam of light from sky downward, but did not beam to ground.  approx 6 x's

content.detailedDescription: I was working in my back yard and saw something black sitting in the sky i decided to take a picture but on the second photo this long white object some how came into focus i didn't see the white object until later when i was going through my photos on monday and was amazed at what was captured i thought the black one was a kite but i saw no one under it.I didn't notice the white one while i was taking the photo and even called my wife out to see it i brought it to her attention on monday after i reviewed the photos i have no idea what they are.I have two amazing photos but i can't download them for some reason but these things can clearly be seen on the photos i took i still can't believe what i captured this is the clearest picture i've seen thank you mufon for your concerns on this matter
content.summary: These two objects were taken from my back yard i thought the black one was a kite then the white one appeared

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped out @ 1:39am on 3-12-2018 with dogs, no street lamps so it was dark save porch light, sky was completely clear and bright with stars, i was looking at stars when i turned to the east and noticed a large pulsating/blinking light in the east halfway above the horizon. 
it was stationary, pulsating bright yellow and growing larger with each sequential pulse. mesmerizing. 
then i heard a large jet coming in from the west behind me and it flew went overhead directly towards the light. note: our local airport (bgm) closes at 11:30pm. 
the ball of light flashed brightly as if it noticed the jet, it became a much smaller light that ascended at an angle towards the southeast.
i am a novice astronomer and there are no known stars in the same space.
area of observation is elevated and no visual obstructions like trees, or bldgs. this had no characteristics of a meteor, fireball, and it appeared in an area that i have not notice any commercial flight path.
content.summary: Clear sky, dark, observed bright pulsating & blinking light in sky, then acsended after jet appeared overhead flight path in direction of object

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 8:45 pm i went outside to take the garbage to the alley. i always look up at the sky at night to see if i can see any stars. i noticed a red glowing object (not blinking) off to the east, estimated at about a mile or two away (i'm not a good judge of distances i admit), it was about 30 degrees above the horizon, at first i assumed it was just a helicopter or a plane since there's a military base and airports nearby. but i noticed it was travelling faster than any military aircraft i've ever seen and being as close as it was it made absolutely no noise. i saw it travel left to right really fast, then stop instantly, like a sudden stop faster than any helicopter i've ever seen, then go back in the opposite direction and instantly stop, then go back to the right again super fast. it moved off towards the southeast really fast and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Saw glowing red object rapidly changing directions at high speed

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up and they were all looking at me.
little green men i tell you, talking a language out of this world!
i said why thy hell and they understood!
i was abducted by little green men i tell you.

they were smoking, like bro wtf is dis human.
content.summary: It was all very scary i was meeting their ruler
